entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How may I help you today?
Yeah, I need to return this stupid VeloBand Pulse. It's not working right.
I understand you'd like to return your VeloBand Pulse. Can I get your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
Thank you. Just a moment while I pull up your order. Okay, I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on November 15th. Today is November 30th, which means it's been 15 days since the purchase.
Yeah, so? What's the problem? I want to return it!
I understand. However, our return policy states that items must be returned within 10 days of the original purchase date. Therefore, the return window has unfortunately passed.
Ten days? Are you serious? That's ridiculous! I've barely had a chance to use it! This VeloBand Pulse is faulty, I tell you. I want a full refund.

I apologize for the inconvenience. While I can't offer a full refund due to the return window, I can explore if we can offer you store credit instead. However, let me double-check regarding possible exceptions based on the state of the device. One moment, please.

Store credit? What am I supposed to do with store credit? I just want my money back! This is completely unacceptable. This VeloBand Pulse thing is garbage! Why would you have such a short return policy, anyway?

I understand your frustration. Unfortunately, the 10-day return policy is standard across our wearable tech. As for the store credit, perhaps there is something else within the fitness equipment range you might find helpful. I am very sorry that the initial item was below par.
Forget the 'helpful'! Look, just do a policy exception. You can do that, right? I'm a long-time customer!

I understand your request for a policy exception. However, exceptions are generally reserved for very specific circumstances, such as a significant defect upon arrival, which doesn't seem to be the case here. Since you have had it for more than 10 days, it will be considered outside this exception.
So, you're telling me there's nothing you can do? This is the worst customer service I've ever experienced! I'm never buying anything from VeloFit again! You're useless!
I sincerely apologize that I couldn't resolve this to your satisfaction. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, just forget it! This is a waste of my time.
I understand. Have a good day.
